sig_info: The duration of the Hunt is increased by 0.5 to 2.5 second(s).

Whenever Jabari Panther would gain a Huntress Charge while the Hunt is active, she instead gains an indefinite Counterpunch Charge. Max Charges starts at 1, and increases by 1 for every 33 signature levels obtained.
A Counterpunch Charge is spent to gain Unstoppable for 0.75 second(s) when Blocking an Attack, and all are lost when the Hunt ends.

ALL ATTACKS: Gain a non-stacking Cleanse Passive for 2 second(s). When a Champion with Cleanse is inflicted with a Debuff, it is immediately Purified and Cleanse is removed.
While fighting as a Defender, if Jabari Panther Purifies a Stun Debuff, this ability goes on cooldown for 8 second(s).
CRITICAL HITS: Inflict a Bleed Debuff, dealing 56.55 Direct Damage over 7 second(s).
THE HUNTRESS: A skilled huntress, Jabari Panther stalks her Opponents no matter where they run or hide. Gain 1 Huntress Charge(s) when Attacking a Stunned or Ensnared Opponent.

Gain 3 Huntress Charge(s) whenever Jabari Panther Purifies a Debuff, and when the Opponent Evades or causes an Attack to Miss. When fighting as an Attacker, this only triggers while Jabari Panther has 5 or fewer Charges.
After gaining any Charges, no more can be gained for 1.25 second(s).
Lose 2 Huntress Charge(s) whenever the Opponent gains a Prowess Buff or Passive.
THE HUNT: Once Jabari Panther has at least 10 Huntress Charges, remove them and Hunt the Opponent for 9 second(s). Huntress Charges cannot be gained while Hunting.
While the Hunt is on, Jabari Panther is Stun Immune and gains a Precision Buff, increasing Critical Rating by +6400.
Additionally, the Opponent cannot trigger the Dexterity mastery, Evade, or cause Attacks to Miss.
Whenever Jabari Panther Purifies a Debuff, or the Opponent fails a Miss or Evade, Pause the Hunt and all Fury Buffs on Jabari Panther for 2 second(s).
Inflicting a Bleed Debuff Pauses all Bleed Debuffs on the Opponent for 0.50 second(s).
HEAVY ATTACKS: If the Hunt is active, each Bleed Debuff on the Opponent has a 50% chance to inflict another Bleed Debuff, dealing 65.25 Direct Damage over 7 second(s). This ends the Hunt.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Activating any Special Attack and the Hunt within 1 second(s) of each other grants a non-stacking Fury Buff, increasing Attack Rating by +139.2 for 9 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: On activation, inflict an Ensnare Debuff on the Opponent for 11 second(s). Ensnared Champions suffer -30% Ability Accuracy and cannot Evade.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The Hunt is Paused during this Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: The next time the Hunt activates, the Opponent is also Stunned for 4.50 second(s).
Gain 3 permanent Huntress charge(s) that are not removed when the Hunt triggers. Max 6.

sig_info: The duration of the Hunt is increased by 0.5 to 2.5 second(s).

Whenever Jabari Panther would gain a Huntress Charge while the Hunt is active, she instead gains an indefinite Counterpunch Charge. Max Charges starts at 1, and increases by 1 for every 33 signature levels obtained.
A Counterpunch Charge is spent to gain Unstoppable for 0.75 second(s) when Blocking an Attack, and all are lost when the Hunt ends.

THE HUNT: Once Jabari Panther has at least 10 Huntress Charges, remove them and Hunt the Opponent for 9 second(s). Huntress Charges cannot be gained while Hunting.
While the Hunt is on, Jabari Panther is Stun Immune and gains a Precision Buff, increasing Critical Rating by +7800.
Additionally, the Opponent cannot trigger the Dexterity mastery, Evade, or cause Attacks to Miss.
Whenever Jabari Panther Purifies a Debuff, or the Opponent fails a Miss or Evade, Pause the Hunt and all Fury Buffs on Jabari Panther for 2 second(s).
Inflicting a Bleed Debuff Pauses all Bleed Debuffs on the Opponent for 0.50 second(s).
HEAVY ATTACKS: If the Hunt is active, each Bleed Debuff on the Opponent has a 50% chance to inflict another Bleed Debuff, dealing 683.25 Direct Damage over 7 second(s). This ends the Hunt.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Activating any Special Attack and the Hunt within 1 second(s) of each other grants a non-stacking Fury Buff, increasing Attack Rating by +1457.6 for 9 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: On activation, inflict an Ensnare Debuff on the Opponent for 11 second(s). Ensnared Champions suffer -30% Ability Accuracy and cannot Evade.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The Hunt is Paused during this Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: The next time the Hunt activates, the Opponent is also Stunned for 4.50 second(s).
Gain 3 permanent Huntress charge(s) that are not removed when the Hunt triggers. Max 6.

sig_info: The duration of the Hunt is increased by 0.5 to 2.5 second(s).

Whenever Jabari Panther would gain a Huntress Charge while the Hunt is active, she instead gains an indefinite Counterpunch Charge. Max Charges starts at 1, and increases by 1 for every 33 signature levels obtained.
A Counterpunch Charge is spent to gain Unstoppable for 0.75 second(s) when Blocking an Attack, and all are lost when the Hunt ends.

ALL ATTACKS: Gain a non-stacking Cleanse Passive for 2 second(s). When a Champion with Cleanse is inflicted with a Debuff, it is immediately Purified and Cleanse is removed.
While fighting as a Defender, if Jabari Panther Purifies a Stun Debuff, this ability goes on cooldown for 8 second(s).
CRITICAL HITS: Inflict a Bleed Debuff, dealing 790.4 Direct Damage over 7 second(s).
THE HUNTRESS: A skilled huntress, Jabari Panther stalks her Opponents no matter where they run or hide. Gain 1 Huntress Charge(s) when Attacking a Stunned or Ensnared Opponent.

Gain 3 Huntress Charge(s) whenever Jabari Panther Purifies a Debuff, and when the Opponent Evades or causes an Attack to Miss. When fighting as an Attacker, this only triggers while Jabari Panther has 5 or fewer Charges.
After gaining any Charges, no more can be gained for 1.25 second(s).
Lose 2 Huntress Charge(s) whenever the Opponent gains a Prowess Buff or Passive.
THE HUNT: Once Jabari Panther has at least 10 Huntress Charges, remove them and Hunt the Opponent for 9 second(s). Huntress Charges cannot be gained while Hunting.

SPECIAL ATTACK 3: The next time the Hunt activates, the Opponent is also Stunned for 4.50 second(s).
Gain 3 permanent Huntress charge(s) that are not removed when the Hunt triggers. Max 6.

ALL ATTACKS: Gain a non-stacking Cleanse Passive for 2 second(s). When a Champion with Cleanse is inflicted with a Debuff, it is immediately Purified and Cleanse is removed.
While fighting as a Defender, if Jabari Panther Purifies a Stun Debuff, this ability goes on cooldown for 8 second(s).
CRITICAL HITS: Inflict a Bleed Debuff, dealing 44.85 Direct Damage over 7 second(s).
THE HUNTRESS: A skilled huntress, Jabari Panther stalks her Opponents no matter where they run or hide. Gain 1 Huntress Charge(s) when Attacking a Stunned or Ensnared Opponent.

Gain 3 Huntress Charge(s) whenever Jabari Panther Purifies a Debuff, and when the Opponent Evades or causes an Attack to Miss. When fighting as an Attacker, this only triggers while Jabari Panther has 5 or fewer Charges.
After gaining any Charges, no more can be gained for 1.25 second(s).
Lose 2 Huntress Charge(s) whenever the Opponent gains a Prowess Buff or Passive.
THE HUNT: Once Jabari Panther has at least 10 Huntress Charges, remove them and Hunt the Opponent for 9 second(s). Huntress Charges cannot be gained while Hunting.
While the Hunt is on, Jabari Panther is Stun Immune and gains a Precision Buff, increasing Critical Rating by +6200.
Additionally, the Opponent cannot trigger the Dexterity mastery, Evade, or cause Attacks to Miss.
Whenever Jabari Panther Purifies a Debuff, or the Opponent fails a Miss or Evade, Pause the Hunt and all Fury Buffs on Jabari Panther for 2 second(s).
Inflicting a Bleed Debuff Pauses all Bleed Debuffs on the Opponent for 0.50 second(s).
HEAVY ATTACKS: If the Hunt is active, each Bleed Debuff on the Opponent has a 50% chance to inflict another Bleed Debuff, dealing 51.75 Direct Damage over 7 second(s). This ends the Hunt.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Activating any Special Attack and the Hunt within 1 second(s) of each other grants a non-stacking Fury Buff, increasing Attack Rating by +110.4 for 9 second(s).
